newsitem.title: USA: USA Detergents named in shareholder suit.
newsitem.headline: USA Detergents named in shareholder suit.

text.p: Plaintiffs' attornies say that they have filed a class action lawsuit on behalf shareholders of USA Detergents Inc against the company, USA Detergent officers and directors in federal court.

The suit alleges that the defendants concealed material information concerning the costs and expenses associated with building company's national distribution infrastructure, a lack of adequate internal accounting controls and their effect on the company's operational and financial condition.
The suit was filed by the lawfirm Esquire, Greenfield & Rifkin LLP.
